alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 01 at 6:57PM PDT until September 01 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Southeastern San Bernardino County in southern California. * WHEN...Until 1000 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 656 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lake Havasu City, Laughlin, Highway 95 At Mile Marker 29, Parker Dam, Needles, Essex, Highway 95 And I-40, Mohave Valley, Black Canyon Equestrian Campground, Hole In The Wall Campground, Vidal Junction, Mid Hills Campground, Big River, Earp, Three Dunes Campground, Black Meadow Landing Campground and Nipton. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
